changelog: New! AI Sphere—new voice-visual UI with mood animations. Enable under Floating Subtitles in Settings. External Control API—broadcast commands for service, mic, wake, stop. Works with Tasker, ADB. STT/TTS text exposed as HA sensors. Bermuda bluetooth proxy rebuilt, dead scanners fixed. Browser/Screensaver switching stabilized for Immich-kiosk—no more loading failures or freezes after repeated switches. Media resumes after voice, karaoke text sync with char-weighted switching, breathing glow effect, per-device gradients. Camera tweaks for Samsung Tab A8.
